name: ListCashDrawerShifts
description:
Provides the details for all of the cash drawer shifts for a location
in a date range.

location_id.description: The ID of the location to query for a list of cash drawer shifts.

sort_order.description:
The order in which cash drawer shifts are listed in the response,
based on their opened_at field. Default value: ASC

begin_time.description: The inclusive start time of the query on opened_at, in ISO 8601 format.

end_time.description: The exclusive end date of the query on opened_at, in ISO 8601 format.

limit.description:
Number of cash drawer shift events in a page of results (200 by
default, 1000 max).

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page of results.

$ul: **cursor**: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page of results. Cursor is not
**errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**items**: A collection of CashDrawerShiftSummary objects for shifts that match
